tool_description: Maps source database data types to target format data types with conversion rules and compatibility warnings.

source_database_type.description: Source database type (mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, sqlite)

target_format.description: Target format (csv, json, xml, parquet, avro)

source_data_types.description: List of source data types to map

error_messages: Unsupported source database: Use one of [mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, sqlite]
Unsupported target format: Use one of [csv, json, xml, parquet, avro]
Invalid data type: One or more source data types are not recognized
Empty data types list: Provide at least one data type to map
usage: Specify source_database_type, target_format, and array of source_data_types to get mapping rules and compatibility information.

mappings_created.description: Number of successful type mappings created

compatible_types.description: List of fully compatible type mappings

lossy_conversions.description: List of mappings that may lose precision or data

unsupported_types.description: List of types that cannot be mapped to target format
